casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Raymond Alan GRIFFIN. No. 322P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 21, 2015. Raymond Alan Griffin, Raleigh, for Griffin, Raymond Alan. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of October 2015 by Petitioner for Appeal of Habeas Corpus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of October 2015."
